Notes: Required - 'yes' or 'no' indicating if police attended the accident scene
Police accident reference/incident number - Optional if police attended (e.g., CAD123456)
Which police force attended - Optional if police attended (e.g., Thames Valley Police)
Attending officer's name - Optional if police attended (e.g., PC John Smith)
Officer's badge/collar number - Optional if police attended (e.g., 12345)
User's breath test result - Optional if police attended (not_tested, negative_0mg, below_limit, at_limit, above_limit, refused, unable)
Other driver's breath test result - Optional if police attended (unknown, not_tested, negative_0mg, below_limit, at_limit, above_limit, refused, arrested)
Required - 'yes' or 'no' indicating if airbags deployed in user's vehicle
Required - 'yes' or 'no' indicating if user and all passengers were wearing seatbelts
Explanation for why seatbelts were not worn - Required if seatbelts_worn = 'no' (max 500 chars, min 5 required)
Character count display showing current/max characters in seatbelt reason (e.g., '250 / 500 characters')
